heading: HR01740
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE REPORTED DECLINE OF THE PHILIPPINES' RANKING IN THE LATEST CORRUPTION PERCEPTIONS INDEX OF TRANSPARENCY INTERNATIONAL WITH AN END VIEW OF ENACTING MEASURES TO CURTAIL CORRUPT  PRACTICES AND FURTHER IMPROVE THE TRANSPARENCY AND ACCOUNTABILITY OF THE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01740
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE REPORTED DECLINE OF THE PHILIPPINES' RANKING IN THE LATEST CORRUPTION PERCEPTIONS INDEX OF TRANSPARENCY INTERNATIONAL WITH AN END VIEW OF ENACTING MEASURES TO CURTAIL CORRUPT PRACTICES AND FURTHER IMPROVE THE TRANSPARENCY AND ACCOUNTABILITY OF THE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT
